column4: Mornin boys, I'm on a new install of Gutsy and no matter what I do I can't get flash to install/work with firefox, I can install through the cute firefox prompt, looks like it works but no result, same thing through synaptic
any ideas on why flash doesn't seem to want to work with mozilla?
yeah, I've already been throug what ubotu says
so you've tried to fix flash the unsupported way?
